promotion.mainText: NFTs for Fanatics, Filmaholics, Foodies & more. Find Your Fandom.

sports.title: Real fans never leave early
sports.description: Collectibles for the tailgaters, face painters, court stormers, and jersey burners. For the fanatics that live for The Hail Marys, buzzer beaters, walk-offs and winning shots.

creatures.description1: Playbooks brings to life the most memorable plays from the college and professional careers of football legends. Each NFT focuses on a defining gridiron moment, chosen by the player, and highlighted with artistry, animation and recorded commentary from the athletes themselves.
creatures.description2: The custom, limited edition Playbooks NFTs - Phenom, Star, Icon and Legend - have unlockable rewards for those who collect all four of the same player, including virtual events with the players and rare signed memorabilia.
creatures.stepsDesc: What you can do to prepare:
creatures.steps1: Sign up now and get notified when they arrive
creatures.sign_up: Sign up now, if you dare →
creatures.title: Exiled Aliens

profile.emptyList: You don’t have any collectibles in your gallery yet. Start your collection.

checkboxes.description: You’re almost ready! You must activate your wallet before you start collecting. We recommend doing this ahead of time -- don’t worry, you won’t be charged until you decide to purchase.

promotion.title: Featured Collection
promotion.subtitle: Pro Football Hall of Fame Village
promotion.primaryText: Playbooks brings to life the most memorable plays from the college and professional careers of football legends. Each NFT focuses on a defining gridiron moment, chosen by the player, and highlighted with artistry, animation and recorded commentary from the athletes themselves.
promotion.secondaryText: The custom, limited edition Playbooks NFTs - Phenom, Star, Icon and Legend - have unlockable rewards for those who collect all four of the same player, including virtual events with the players and rare signed memorabilia.

buyNft.activateWallet: You must activate your wallet in order to start your collection. You only need to do this once!
buyNft.fundWallet: You don't have enough money for this NFT. You can fund your wallet here

login.title: Sign in using your FTX.us account

error.firstNameError: First name must be at least 3 characters long
error.lastNameError: Last name must be at least 3 characters long
error.passwordError: Password must be at least 8 characters long and include at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one symbol and one number

kyc.title: Set your wallet to continue
kyc.criminalRecord: I certify that I do not have a criminal record
kyc.notExposedPerson: I certify that I am not a politically exposed person or government official

verification.title: We need to verify your card to continue
verification.description: This is just a security step. Please enter the amount we just charged to your credit card.
verification.label: Introduce the charge on your credit card
verification.question: Didn't receive any charges?
verification.loadingMsg: We are processing your data, this might take a few seconds...
verification.successMsg: Great! Your credit card was verified successfully

error.expiryMonth: Month should be formatted as M or MM
error.expiryYear: Year should be formatted as YYYY
error.country: Country should be formatted as XXX
error.district: State should be formatted as XX
